problem.markdown:
Review the Consistency - Data dashboard. Reset the Period to September, 2020. Which district had the most suspicious Penta 1 to Penta 3 dropout rate for the last 12 months? >>Select the one correct answer: (2 attempts)<<
( ) A. A-4 ( ) B. B-4 ( ) C. C-4 (x) D. D-4 [explanation] The correct answer is D-4. [explanation]
